availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Lindsay. Father of Eugene Lindsay, Albert Lindsay, Edwin Lindsay, Lorinda Lindsay, Mary Lindsay, George Lindsay, Cynthia Lindsay, Emmeline Lindsay, Eleata Lindsay, Melissa Lindsay, James E. Lindsay, and Samantha Lindsay. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 2, p. 458B-459A.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 180B.
